content:
As you approach the spot where the demon dissipated, you can see that there are some remains left behind. Upon closer inspection, you notice that there are a few small, black stones scattered around the area.

You recognize these stones as demon-soul shards, a powerful and rare magical ingredient. They are formed when a demon is destroyed and its energy is released. These shards are highly sought after by many practitioners of dark magic, as they can be used in spells to increase power and control.

You carefully collect the shards, knowing that they could be useful in your future battles against the supernatural. As you do so, you notice that there is also a small piece of paper lying nearby.

You pick it up and unfold it, revealing a cryptic message scrawled in red ink. It reads, "The master has plans for the city. You cannot stop us all."

You can feel a chill run down your spine as you realize that this is a message from the vampire gang you were investigating. It seems that they are up to something big, and you will need to be even more vigilant in your efforts to protect the city.

You tuck the paper into your pocket and head back to your apartment, already planning your next move. You know that the fight against the supernatural never truly ends, but you're ready for whatever comes next.
